subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Celtics’ Paul Pierce, 35, is considered one of the league’s stalwart and sage big-game veterans. His delayed rise might reflect the best-case career trajectory for the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony.
snippet: The Celtics’ Paul Pierce, 35, is considered one of the league’s stalwart and sage big-game veterans. His delayed rise might reflect the best-case career trajectory for the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony.
